name: Gitara (Guitar)
description:
WHAT'S THIS?

A short, (around 15 minutes long) scuff and sappy visual novel about a lesbian who sometimes plays the acoustic guitar.

I made this for the Yuri Game Jam 2022.

I hope that you'll somewhat enjoy playing the first game I've ever published... question mark? smiley face?

(PS. I'm not really sure that the Mac version of this game works properly because I don't really use a Mac... but hopefully it works?)

COOL STUFF!
